patthana18.9:4.1: Hetuṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.9:4.2: Nahetuṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.9:4.3: Hetuṃ saraṇañca nahetuṃ saraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.9:4.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.9:5.1: Nahetuṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.9:5.2: Nahetuṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.9:5.3: Nahetuṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu naaraṇo ca nanahetu naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
